name: The Dungeon of Mynes Weeper
description:
A dungeon-crawling puzzle game, combining roguelike Role-Playing Games with Minesweeper! Solve timed minesweeper puzzles to defeat monsters and delve deep into the mysterious dungeon of the Demon Lord Mynes. Creative abilities, mechanics, and enemies help make this into the most unique version of Minesweeper ever seen!

  • 4 character classes with varied playstyles and abilities
  • 35 different enemies that each provide distinct challenges
  • 25 trinkets to equip for countless build options
  • Lovingly hand-crafted pixelart sprites
  • Non-square boards, poison tiles, and more! Even minesweeper veterans will find something new
  • Detailed tutorial to help new players learn the ins and outs of traditional minesweeper gameplay

Credits:

All art and programming by Cody Paterson. Playtest help provided by Sephirob, Paratroopa, Ravenfeld, and Bret Nabors. Special thanks to Danni, Kristine, Jacob, Lacey, Louie, and Boss. 

And, of course, an extra special thanks to you, the player!
